description: Decode & color P2SH redeem Scripts, to HTML! Daemon CLI supported (GUI wallet). TX, TXID, .txn & .artifact input. Selection highlighting of OpCodes, etc. Choose OP_CODES↔codes, etc. Convert hex↔asm↔<dec>↔octal, etc. Plugin can auto-return BCH sent to its pReturn... covenant, using PrivKey=1.
